heading: HR02161
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE GREATER SUPPORT TO PHILIPPINE ATHLETES IN ORDER TO BETTER RESPOND TO THEIR NEEDS AND PROMOTE SPORTS AND ATHLETICS AS A PRACTICAL AND RESPECTABLE PROFESSION, WITH AN END VIEW OF FURTHER IMPROVING OUR STANDING IN INTERNATIONAL MULTI-SPORT EVENTS
status: Pending with the Committee on YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT since 2018-09-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02161
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE GREATER SUPPORT TO PHILIPPINE ATHLETES IN ORDER TO BETTER RESPOND TO THEIR NEEDS AND PROMOTE SPORTS AND ATHLETICS AS A PRACTICAL AND RESPECTABLE PROFESSION, WITH AN END VIEW OF FURTHER IMPROVING OUR STANDING IN INTERNATIONAL MULTI-SPORT EVENTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-10
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2018-09-11
